content.question: Which details from the passage would best support a reader’s interpretation that escape is a central theme of the passage?

choices.label: The time period that Tom evokes and the music of the fiddle in the wings
The revolution in Spain and Tom’s father’s job at the telephone company
Tom’s use of memories to narrate the play and his admitted weakness for symbols
Tom’s description of the gentleman caller and his reference to the postcard from Mazatlan

content.answer: Tom’s description of the gentleman caller and his reference to the postcard from Mazatlan

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
